title: Golden Stock
question_text:
Two hatchery trucks, each carrying $600$ trout (trout is a type of fish), arrive at a trout stocking location. Truck A has $28\%$ golden trout while truck B has $22\%$ golden trout. Because the fish are in holding tanks with rapidly moving water, each release can be considered a random sample of fish.
Truck A releases fish in groups of $40$ fish while truck B releases fish in groups of $50$ fish. An avid angler counts the number of golden trout in the first release from each truck and computes the difference in their sample proportions, $\hat{p}_A-\hat{p}_B$.
What is the approximate mean and standard deviation of the sampling distribution of $\hat{p}_A-\hat{p}_B$?
